name: Killer Casino
description:
Created by Thatonedude077 and Lil Monch

W/A/S/D to move

mouse to aim and right click to shoot

E is used to interact with Doors and Slot Machines 

Esc to exit game

F1 to go fullscreen

Gun Slot Machine will deal out a random weapon to player

Red Slot Machine will give a random stat bonus
